subject: Replace find.js saga-scanner with shared scanStories
description:
Update `packages/saga-utils/src/scripts/find/finder.ts` to import `scanStories` from `../../storage.ts` instead of `./saga-scanner.ts`.

**Steps:**
1. Update imports in `finder.ts` — replace `scanStories`, `storiesDirectoryExists`, `epicsDirectoryExists` imports from `./saga-scanner.ts` with imports from `../../storage.ts`
2. Update `ScannedStory` type reference — the new type from storage.ts may have slightly different fields. Ensure `toStoryInfo()` mapping still works or adjust it.
3. The `findStory()` function calls `scanStories()` which was async — the new one is sync. Update to remove `await` and make `findStory` / `loadAndFilterStories` sync (or wrap in Promise.resolve if keeping the async signature for backwards compat).
4. Delete `packages/saga-utils/src/scripts/find/saga-scanner.ts`
5. Update or delete `packages/saga-utils/src/scripts/find/saga-scanner.test.ts` — move any unique test cases to `storage.test.ts`, delete the file
6. Run find.js tests to verify: `pnpm test -- --testPathPattern find`
doneWhen: finder.ts imports from storage.ts. saga-scanner.ts under find/ is deleted. All find tests pass.
